name: greige
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a colour that is between beige (= light brown) and grey: Here's a funky way to brighten up the greige.
Vladimir Nenov/EyeEm/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesThe jacket is available in greige and black.He didn't even know the difference between taupe and greige.White is more flattering on most people than greige.Greige, a cross between grey and beige, dominated the red carpet this year.

between beige (= light brown) and grey in colour: She wore a pink sweater with her greige dress.
More examplesFewer examplesHis hair is defiantly greige.It's a huge kitchen with greige units and integrated appliances.Her jumpsuit was greige, with pockets all over it.Hoppen is an interior designer who uses a greige palette of matt neutrals.
